lines.text: As the end of the week approached, we needed to act fast and get this heist going.
The plan, I thought, was pretty good.
The building sits in downtown Gunn City, the I-Cup headquarters.
It is one of those older models that has four ground floor entrances with sliding doors.
It's a charity building, so there's no immediate security protocol.
That was disabled in a cost-cutting measure back when ICUP was under Papi Chuko's Technoslime.
However, once inside the building, there were certain security and authentication measures
that anyone would need to get past private security hired for the affair.
